item.title: Buy Custom Domain With Azure for your App Service.
item.description: If you googled how to buy a domain name on Azure, you might get answers saying that Azure doesn’t provide domain name registrar, like the following answer, or the following discussion. Not even those answers, even the book Exam Ref AZ-900 which is a Microsoft book says the following about Azure DNS Zone: If you want to purchase your own domain name, you go to a domain registrar, and they register the domain to you.
